name: Chroma Hotel
description: Welcome to the Chroma Hotel! Grand re-opening tonight. Don’t be late.

name: The Commons
description: Web 3 cyber cafes. Coffee served 24/7. You’re welcome. Discover hidden games. Lofi Jams. CC0punks welcome...

name: Mouth Slide
description: Disclaimer: Chroma Inc. is not responsible for what happens to any individuals who willingly choose to use the Mouth Slide. That being said; it’s the fastest way to get to the surface of the Earth below!

name: Floatown
description: We all float here! Discover hidden art galleries and claimable pieces.

name: Longbridge
description: Longbridge has 1,999 steps, plan accordingly. Longbridge will take you to the Observatorium. Have fun!
